src_original: [ Bendall ed p180 ---> ]  āryôgradattaparipṛcchāyām apy uktaṃ /  punar aparaṃ gṛhapate gṛhiṇā bodhisatvenânunayapratighâpagatena bhavitavyam aṣṭalokadharmânanuliptena /
tena bhogalābhena vā bhāryāputralābhena vā dhanadhānyavittalābhena vā nônnamitavyaṃ na praharṣitavyaṃ /
sarvavipattiṣu cânena nâvanamitavyaṃ /  na durmanasā bhavitavyaṃ evaṃ cânena pratyavekṣitavyaṃ /
